description: Law and Order Trust Fund for Afghanistan – Phase VI: support to police remunerations, police infrastructure, police capacity development

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: Improved mobility, responsiveness, operational efficiency and morale in the police force  through required equipment and infrastructure. Police  force  and uniformed personnel of Central Prisons Department (CPD) supported for contribution to their increased effectiveness and efficiency. Ministry of Interior  police remuneration paid regularly and timely in 34 provinces.
donor_long: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: Support to Law & Order – LOTFA

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: Capacity of MoI at policy, organizational and individual level in identified areas as well as administrative systems improved.  Strengthened policy development in MoI  within the framework of IPPD (set up for co-ordination of police operational and administrative policy as well as functional review of tasks and functions of MoI towards production of an overall police policy, operational and functions manual).  Strengthened UNDP-Rule of Law Cluster  within framework of MoI capacity development and institutional reform
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: Capacity Dev & Institutional R

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: Police-Community partnerships institutionalized for improved local security, accountability and service delivery. Institutionalize Community Policing through strengthened Police-e-Mardumi  Secretariat in lead up to transition.  Improved Capacity of Dept. of Training and Education enhanced to deliver training, in partnership with EUPOL/NTMA (NATO Training Mission for Afghanistan).
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: Democratic Policing - LOTFA VI

subproject.description: Project Management Support Unit (MSU) delivers all annual targets in line with rules and regulations. MSU remain functional throughout the year for delivery of project outputs
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: Technical Assistance

title: Law and Order Trust Fund for Afghanistan – Phase VI
